data.lyric:
[ti:Falling]
[ar:Trevor Daniel]
[al:Homesick]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Falling - Trevor Daniel
[00:15.10]My last made me feel like
[00:16.82]I would never try again
[00:18.83]But when I saw you I felt something I never felt
[00:22.64]Come closer I'll give you all my love
[00:26.14]If you treat me right baby I'll give you everything
[00:30.25]My last made me feel like I would never try again
[00:33.98]But when I saw you I felt something I never felt
[00:37.87]Come closer I'll give you all my love
[00:41.15]If you treat me right baby I'll give you everything
[00:45.34]Talk to me I need to hear you need me like
[00:50.45]I need ya
[00:53.19]Fall for me I wanna know you feel
[00:57.33]How I feel for you love
[01:00.75]Before you baby I was numb drown the pain by pouring up
[01:03.67]Speeding fast on the run never want to get caught up
[01:06.70]Now you the one that I'm calling
[01:08.46]Swore that I'd never forget don't think
[01:11.03]I'm just talking
[01:12.48]I think I might go all in no exceptions girl
[01:15.26]I need ya
[01:16.78]Feeling like I'm out of my mind
[01:18.17]'Cause I can't get enough
[01:19.69]Only one that I give my time 'cause
[01:21.82]I got time for ya
[01:23.42]Might make an exception for ya
[01:25.55]'Cause I been feeling ya
[01:27.13]Think I might be out of my mind
[01:29.26]I think that you're the one
[01:30.81]My last made me feel like I would never try again
[01:34.57]But when I saw you I felt something I never felt
[01:38.47]Come closer I'll give you all my love
[01:41.73]If you treat me right baby I'll give you everything
[01:45.82]My last made me feel like I would never try again
[01:49.55]But when I saw you I felt something I never felt
[01:53.39]Come closer I'll give you all my love
[01:56.84]If you treat me right baby I'll give you everything
[02:00.93]I'll never give my all again
[02:04.00]'Cause I'm sick of falling down
[02:07.50]When I open up and give my trust
[02:11.28]They find a way to break it down
[02:22.94]Tear me up inside and you break me down
data.trans:
[ti:Falling]
[ar:Trevor Daniel]
[al:Homesick]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:15.10]我的上一段恋情
[00:16.82]让我心灰意冷 不愿再次尝试
[00:18.83]可当我遇见你时 我感到从未有过的悸动
[00:22.64]靠近我 我会全心全意地爱你
[00:26.14]如果你真心待我 我会给你一切
[00:30.25]我的上一段恋情让我心灰意冷 不愿再次尝试
[00:33.98]可当我遇见你时 我感到从未有过的悸动
[00:37.87]靠近我 我会全心全意地爱你
[00:41.15]如果你真心待我 我会给你一切
[00:45.34]与我交谈 我渴望听见你说
[00:50.45]你像我迷恋你一般地需要我
[00:53.19]为我沉沦 我渴望知道
[00:57.33]你和我感同身受
[01:00.75]宝贝 遇见你之前 我沉浸在痛苦里 无法自拔
[01:03.67]我拼命奔跑 不想陷入爱情的桎梏
[01:06.70]你是我苦苦寻觅的真爱
[01:08.46]我发誓我永远不会忘记 我不会认为
[01:11.03]我只是说说而已
[01:12.48]女孩 无一例外 我会全力以赴
[01:15.26]我需要你
[01:16.78]我觉得自己快要失去理智
[01:18.17]因为我总是无法满足
[01:19.69]只有一人让我付出所有时间
[01:21.82]我愿与你相伴一生
[01:23.42]我可以为你破例
[01:25.55]因为你让我魂牵梦萦
[01:27.13]我想可能失去理智
[01:29.26]我想你是我命中注定对的那个人
[01:30.81]我的上一段恋情让我心灰意冷 不愿再次尝试
[01:34.57]可当我遇见你时 我感到从未有过的悸动
[01:38.47]靠近我 我会全心全意地爱你
[01:41.73]如果你真心待我 我会给你一切
[01:45.82]我的上一段恋情让我心灰意冷 不愿再次尝试
[01:49.55]可当我遇见你时 我感到从未有过的悸动
[01:53.39]靠近我 我会全心全意地爱你
[01:56.84]如果你真心待我 我会给你一切
[02:00.93]我不会毫无保留地爱上一个人
[02:04.00]因为我对爱情心生厌倦
[02:07.50]当我敞开心扉 付出信任
[02:11.28]他们总会把我伤得体无完肤
[02:22.94]让我的心支离破碎 而你让我彻底崩溃
